short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows which card you should use to get max cash back

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to PayWise. PayWise is a simple tool to help you maximize your credit card rewards. You can find how much rewards you can make before you make a purchase. No card information other than the card name is required.

OWN YOUR CREDIT CARD REWARDS!
